snippet.title: OpenXCOM Nightly Install Tutorial
snippet.description:
In this video you will learn how to:

00:00 - Intro
00:10 - Agenda 
01:57 - OpenXcom Nightly installer
05:18 - Universal Patch
06:22 - Original game files
09:45 - Copy in original save games
14:58 - Where to get mods and how to install them
17:15 - Install a simple mod (Improved HandObs)
22:38 - Final Modpack
27:17 - Mod Order Hierarchy 
29:25 - Area - 51
33:45 - Hard Mode Expansion
37:27 - Install OpenXcom Extended & OXCE+
42:15 - Universal patch manual install
43:40 - Install X-Com Files
46:44 - OXCE+
48:18 - Continuing X-Com Files install
54:11 - Install X-PirateZ
59:29 - Manually install the latest nightly including
1:01:03 - Milestone 1.0 vs the Nightly builds
1:08:10 - Where to find and put the original game assets
1:12:04 - How to apply the universal patch
1:16:09 - Troubleshoot and find help

Navigation Links on the right side are no longer working.


OpenXcom is available here: http://openxcom.org/downloads/

PirateZ Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLgSfydyBKNBArctHysjyKFtB2o0reJcrB
OpenXcom Milestone 1.0 Tutorial Playlist: http://goo.gl/UwvseH

LP OpenXcom: Up Close and Personal Playlist: 
http://goo.gl/8YQnKS
Terror from the Deep Playlist: http://goo.gl/NvSwdh


Meridian OpenXcom Final Modpack:  https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLe0K-GUDQkNIFsiJLbZIfaoRVsY5qmx09

------------------------------------------------
Links to resources in this tutorial:
Nightly Builds:  http://openxcom.org/git-builds/
OpenXcom Modsite: https://openxcom.mod.io/
Improved HandObs :(IvanDogovich) - https://openxcom.mod.io/improved-hand-objects
Final Mod Pack (FMP):(Solarius Scorch) - https://openxcom.mod.io/final-mod-pack
Area 51 :(Hobbes) - https://openxcom.mod.io/area-51
Hardmode Expansion :(hellrazor) - https://openxcom.mod.io/hardmode-expansion
OpenXCOM Extended :(Yankes) -https://openxcom.mod.io/openxcom-extended 
OpenXCOM Extended Plus (OXCE) : (Meridian) https://openxcom.org/forum/index.php/topic,5258.0.html
X-Com Files : (Solarius Scorch) https://openxcom.mod.io/the-x-com-files
X-PirateZ :(Dioxine) https://openxcom.mod.io/x-piratez
OpenXcom Forums: http://openxcom.org/forum
OpenXcom Discord:  https://discord.com/invite/Gp7X4S4

-------------------------------------------------
Connect with IvanDogovich
Email: ivandogovich@gmail.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/IvanDogovich
http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=ivandogovich


-------------------------------------------------
X-Com Recommended Channels:

Meridian Channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/martindzurenko

X-Com SubReddit: http://www.reddit.com/r/xcom


---------------------------------------------
The Legal Stuff:

Background Music from the following Artists:

Assault on Terran Soil (Gmazi)
https://soundcloud.com/qmagi/assault-on-terran-soil

Hyperdimensional Bastard Squid (Hydracuts)
https://soundcloud.com/hydracuts/awkward-bastard-temporary

Cydonia's Fall (Lorcan)
GMGEO1
GMENBASE
GMEGEO2
http://www.openxcom.com/news/ufo-cydonia-s-fall-soundtrack

Terror from the Deep v6 (The City Hunter)
https://soundcloud.com/the-cityhunter/terror-from-the-deep

In the Bedroom (nOtrO))
https://soundcloud.com/sizzlebird/loving-you-1

Loving You (Sizzlebird)
https://soundcloud.com/sizzlebird/loving-you-1

Technoid Braincell (Den0tz Aliens)
https://soundcloud.com/denotzaliens/technoid-at-denotzaliens

Eternity (Sizzlebird)
https://soundcloud.com/sizzlebird/eternity-1

X-Com Files
AS_2_INTRO
AS_2_THEME

Area 51 (Cryp-tech)
https://soundcloud.com/cryp-tech/area-51

Pirates of Elmia - Fnotte  
https://soundcloud.com/fnotte/the-pirates-of-elmia

Pirate Adventure - Lacifer
http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/576222

X-Com Geoscape (Grim Wizard)
https://soundcloud.com/grim_wizard/xcom-geoscape

Limitless (Sizzlebird)
https://soundcloud.com/sizzlebird/limitless-free

April Sunlight (Sizzle Bird)
https://soundcloud.com/sizzlebird/april-sunlight-free

Electronic Violation (The City Hunter)
https://soundcloud.com/the-cityhunter/electronic-violation

Sailing Along (The British Music Maestro)
https://soundcloud.com/phil-wood-3/sailing-along
